basics.label: RN / ASST. HEAD NURSE PRACTICE LEADER
basics.summary: Highly experienced nursing professional with exposure to various care environments including dementia units, home health, and oncology.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed nursing staff and all aspects of patient care and transportation in a long-term care facility. Took occasionally MOD responsibilities for the entire building and conducted in-services for the nursing staff.

work.name: ResCare
work.summary: Conducted home visits, provided basic assessments, informed medical professionals of changes in patient status and administered injections and infusions. Worked on clinical trial protocols.

work.name: Maxim Home Health
work.summary: Worked as a home health nurse focusing on Infusion cases. Despite the distance-related challenges, I remained committed to the role.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed a 40 bed Locked Dementia Unit, later a 60 bed Long Term Care Unit along with leading nursing unit, setting priorities, developing staff, upholding corporate standards, infection control, QA and care planning.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: RN / Asst. Head Nurse Practice Leader
work.summary: Managed unit staff incl. staffing, scheduling, payroll. Worked closely with Nurse Manager on variety tasks including hiring and disciplinary actions. Started as RN on general Med / Surg Unit, later recruited by Oncology chair to help set up and run 1st Oncology inpatient Unit.

awards.title: Dorothy Rome Nominee
awards.summary: Highest yearly award for Experienced RNs

references.reference: Advocate Illinois Masonic Med. Center now works in Tennessee
